body.p: 1. Priest who ministered during the time of David (1 Chr 24:9).
2. Parosh’s son, who was encouraged by Ezra to divorce his foreign wife during the postexilic period (Ezr 10:25).
3. One of the priests who signed Ezra’s covenant during the postexilic period (Neh 10:7).
4. Priest who returned to Jerusalem with Zerubbabel after the exile (Neh 12:5, nlt “Miniamin”).
